master.name: HIPAA Authorization Content
master.text:
If you would like to receive information about products and services that may interest you, please review and agree to the terms of this Authorization.
I authorize SteadyMD Physician Group, P.C. and its contractual affiliates (collectively, “SteadyMD”) to disclose my health and demographic information (“Information”) to Abbott Rapid Dx North America, LLC and its affiliates, representatives and service providers who provide services in connection with KNOWme™ (collectively, “KNOWme™”) to communicate with me about KNOWme™ product updates, special offers, and related information that may be of interest to me.
I understand that consenting to this Authorization is voluntary and that I may refuse to sign this Authorization by checking “I do NOT agree to the terms of the Authorization.” Services provided by KNOWme™ will not be conditioned upon my signing this Authorization.
I understand I have the right to revoke (cancel) this Authorization at any time through my KNOWme Account via Communication Preferences. My revocation will not be effective to the extent KNOWme™ has already relied on this Authorization. If I do not revoke this Authorization, this Authorization will expire when KNOWme™ no longer offers products and services. I understand that if my Information is disclosed to KNOWme™ for the purpose described above, it is no longer protected by HIPAA. I understand that I am entitled to a copy of this Authorization.
By clicking “I Agree” I understand that I will be signing this Authorization.
